name: Dario Vins
goal:
Address access-to-finance gap of the European impact-driven SMEs and social enterprises whose products resolve complex societal challenges while generating financial returns.

Address growing European impact and social investment sector.
interests: Banking and financial services, Digital economy and society, International co-operation and development, Youth
euInitiatives:
DG Internal Market, Industry, Entrepreneurship and SMEs
Policy Area: Social Economy and Social Enterprises
